attributes.additional_details:
Petition to re-instate volunteers of Bletchley Park whose positions were relinquished on 24 Jan 2014 due to new policy at the heritage site by management.
These volunteers are old enough to have lived through WW2 and are affectively living exhibits themselves and even had their own property as part of the exhibit on the site.
Yet management let them go due to a policy change to provide a "better visitor experience" including making the main house separate from the computer centre where the colossus code breaker is as separate exhibits!
Basically learn all from a touch screen instead of someone who was actually their!   SHAMEFUL!
